languages.text: "Несмотря на свои грехи, Тисифона была великим навигатором и служила Империуму исправно множество лет, как и весь Дом Орселлио. Я искуплю ее грех, избавлю тела своих подданных от ксеноереси... и лишь Атлас новатора будет напоминать потомкам о цене, что нам пришлось заплатить".

traits.locale_text: "Несмотря на свои грехи, Тисифона была великим Навигатором и служила Империуму исправно множество лет, как и весь Дом Орселлио. Я искуплю ее грех, избавлю тела своих подданных от ксено-ереси... и лишь Атлас новатора будет напоминать потомкам о цене, что нам пришлось заплатить".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на свои грехи, Тисифона была великим навигатором и служила Империуму исправно множество лет, как и весь Дом Орселлио. Я искуплю ее грех, избавлю тела своих подданных от ксеноереси... и лишь Атлас новатора будет напоминать потомкам о цене, что нам пришлось заплатить".

traits.locale_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so have House Orsellio. I shall make up for her deeds, rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

I shall make up for her deeds, rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

I shall make up for her sinful deeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あらゆる悪事に手を染めたことを考慮しても、ティシフォンは何年も帝国に、そしてオーセリオ家に忠実に仕えてきた偉大な航宙士です。彼女の悪行はあたくしが償い、異端の異種族に汚された身体を捨てましょう…ノベイターのアトラスだけが、我々の犠牲の末に残るものとなるのです」
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる悪事に手を染めたことを考慮しても、ティシフォンは何年も帝国に、そしてオーセリオ家に忠実に仕えてきた偉大な航宙士です。彼女の悪行はあたくしが償い、異端の異種族に汚された身体を捨てましょう…ノベイターのアトラスだけが、我々の犠牲の末に残るものとなるのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “尽管提西福涅有种种缺点，但她依然是位伟大的导航者，多年来一直忠心耿耿地为帝国服务。奥赛罗家族也同样如此。我要努力弥补她的过错，让我的臣民摆脱异端邪说的影响……只有把大族长的圣仪留在身边，才能提醒我们的子孙后代，让他们明白，我们当年付出了多大代价。”
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: “尽管提西福涅有种种缺点，但她依然是位伟大的导航者，多年来一直忠心耿耿地为帝国服务。奥塞罗家族也同样如此。我要努力弥补她的罪孽，让我的臣民摆脱异端邪说的影响……只有把大族长的圣仪留在身边，才能提醒我们的子孙后代，让他们明白，我们当年付出了多大代价。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Malgré tous ses défauts, Tisiphone était une navigatrice de talent qui a servi fidèlement l'Imperium pendant de nombreuses années, tout comme la maison Orsellio. J'ai l'intention de racheter ses péchés et de débarrasser mes sujets de la xénohérésie qui souille leurs corps. Seule la Novator conservera son Atlas, afin que nul n'oublie jamais le prix que nous avons dû payer. »
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré tous ses défauts, Tisiphone était une navigatrice de talent qui a servi fidèlement l'Imperium pendant de nombreuses années, tout comme la maison Orsellio. J'ai l'intention de racheter ses péchés et de débarrasser mes sujets de la xénohérésie qui souille leurs corps. Seule la Novator conservera son Atlas, afin que nul n'oublie jamais le prix que nous avons dû payer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «A pesar de todos sus errores, Tisiphone fue una Navegante excelente que sirvió al Imperium con lealtad durante muchos años, al igual que ha hecho la casa Orsellio. Expiaré sus felonías y libraré los cuerpos de mis súbditos de la xenoherejía... y tan solo quedará el Atlas del Novator para recordar a nuestros herederos el precio que tuvimos que pagar».
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: «A pesar de todos sus errores, Tisiphone fue una Navegante excelente que sirvió al Imperium con lealtad durante muchos años, al igual que ha hecho la casa Orsellio. Expiaré sus pecados y libraré los cuerpos de mis súbditos de la xenoherejía... y tan solo quedará el Atlas del Novator para recordar a nuestros herederos el precio que tuvimos que pagar».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Trotz all ihrer Fehler war Tisiphone eine große Navigatorin, die dem Imperium viele Jahre lang treu gedient hat, genau wie das Haus Orsellio. Ich werde ihre Missetaten wiedergutmachen und die Körper meiner Untertanen von dieser Xeno-Ketzerei befreien ... und nur der Atlas des Novators wird noch bestehen bleiben, um unsere Familie daran zu erinnern, welchen Preis wir zahlen mussten."
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Trotz all ihrer Fehler war Tisiphone eine große Navigatorin, die dem Imperium viele Jahre lang treu gedient hat, genau wie das Haus Orsellio. Ich werde ihre Sünden wiedergutmachen und die Körper meiner Untertanen von dieser Xeno-Ketzerei befreien ... und nur der Atlas des Novators wird noch bestehen bleiben, um unsere Familie daran zu erinnern, welchen Preis wir zahlen mussten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm kusurlarına rağmen Tisiphone, büyük bir Rotacı olup Orsellio Hanesi gibi yıllarca İmparatorluk'a sadakatle hizmet etmiştir. Tisiphone'nin günahlarını telafi edip kullarımın vücutlarındaki zeno kâfirliğini temizleyeceğim. Ödediğimiz bedeli hatırlatması için evlatlarımıza bir tek Rota Reisi Atlası'nı bırakacağım."
languages.original_text: "Despite all her flaws, Tisiphone was a great Navigator who served the Imperium faithfully for many years, and so has House Orsellio. I shall make up for her misdeeds and rid the bodies of my subjects of xenoheresy... and only the Novator's Atlas will be left to remind our scions of the price we had to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm kusurlarına rağmen Tisiphone, yıllarca İmparatorluk'a sadakatle hizmet eden büyük bir Rotacıdır. Hakeza Orsellio Hanesi de. Tisiphone'nin günahlarını telafi edip kullarımın vücutlarındaki zeno kâfirliğini temizleyeceğim... Evlatlarımıza, ödediğimiz bedeli hatırlatması için geriye sadece Rota Reisi Atlası kalacak."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
